document_data.mainbody: ohmafel was an elf of unknown origin, desert-dwelling per Iahn Qoyllors judgement.While it appears to be strongly implied that Mohmafel is in fact one of the elves from Al Qahera that went missing when the Palace of the Purple Emperor came back to the Realms, this is never outright stated. He was accompanying Deamiel during the latters pursuit of Ususi Manaallin in the , while both were under Pandoryms influence. He was slain by a poisoned bolt fired by Iahn Qoyllor at the time of death, he was wearing a long white gown and wielding a bow.
